dashboard.models module

class ProjectSubmission

Contains a reference to a project, along with details of a project only relevant during mentor/project registration.

class MenteeForm

Allows mentee to choose their preference

MenteePreference

Preferences of a mentee (i.e. a user during a specific season) dashboard.permissions module —————————-

dashboard.serializers module

class ProjectSubmissionSerializer

This serializer has a nested project.mentors field, but since this is read only and co_mentors is write only, this does not cause any issues.

class MenteeSerializer

It uses the mentee form models
